summary: This is a brief email correspondence forwarding deposition documents from December 2009, sent by an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York. It appears to be part of document production or sharing related to the Epstein case.

events.title: Deposition Proceedings
events.description: Deposition proceedings were conducted, with at least two volumes of transcripts generated.

locations.name: Southern District of New York
locations.context: Location of the Assistant United States Attorney's office.

locations.name: New York, NY 10007
locations.context: Address associated with the Assistant United States Attorney's office.

keyFacts: Deposition proceedings from December 4, 2009, are referenced, indicating ongoing legal activity related to the Epstein case at that time.
The documents are being forwarded by an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York in March 2021.
At least two volumes of deposition transcripts from 2009 are attached to the correspondence.
